main event: A civilian reported observing an unidentified object in the sky over Hammond, Indiana for 2.5 hours on 11/09/52.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 2330 hours, The object was observed to be moving in a straight line towards the north-north-east, The sighting was made using a turret telescope, The object was described as having diffused light and being oval-shaped with colors blue, green, orange, and yellow, The conclusion was that the object was probably a star or planet, possibly meteor or specifically the star Capella.
